title: Meeting Notes - Q1 Planning
content:
# Q1 Planning Meeting

## Key Points

2. Increase team size by 2 developers

title: Project Ideas
content:
# New Project Ideas

## 1. Mobile App Redesign
- Modern UI/UX
- Dark mode support
- Offline functionality

## 2. AI Integration
- Chatbot for customer support
- Smart recommendations
- Automated reporting

## 3. Performance Optimization
- Code splitting
- Lazy loading
- CDN implementation

title: Quick Todo
content:
## Things to do today

- Team standup at 3pm

title: Learning Resources
content:
# Resources to Study

## React Advanced Patterns
- Higher Order Components
- Render Props
- Custom Hooks
- Context API best practices

## TypeScript
- Advanced Types
- Generics
- Utility Types
- Type Guards

## Next.js 14

- App Router
- Streaming
- Parallel Routes
